Summary

In this world that we call home exploration is the peak of humanities drive as there so much that we still don’t understand about the ocean, the Earth, space and even our own human existence. In this experience you will be playing one of the explorers that has come across a city that looks as if it has been abandoned for a very long time. There is something strange about the whole situation however. The place is not demolished or very worn by time. It looks as if the people that lived here never actually left, just ceased to be. What does this mean? It is time to explore the city and find out what happened to the people who lived here, but be careful, there may be obstacles along the way.
